name: Laufen Und Raufen
description:
Laufen Und Raufen is a chaotic couch co-op capture-the-flag game for 2-8 players.
Take control of your penguin of choice and fight over the fish of your opponents and defend your own with your almighty flippers!

Features:
  • Play with or against your friends with up to 8 players in 4 teams!
  • Show your mighty skills in a competitive capture the flag fish game with Penguins!
  • Playful and fun gameplay requires a fun and playful art style – and we got both covered!
  • Push penguins… into holes! It’s always fun. Oh – and you can also push a ball.
  • Design your own levels using the built-in level editor. Express your artistic side!
  • Expecting ice, fire, or rollercoasters? No?! Well, you should! The levels and environments of Laufen Und Raufen are rich and varied.
  • Use the game’s easy to pick up controls to reign over the Arctics as the queen/king of the Arctic. We know you can do it!

Game modes:
  • Fish Fight: Competitive capture the flag with Penguins
  • Push-ball: Play the aggressive football of the arctic
  • Deathmatch: The player must push as many of the other penguins as possible
  • Time Attack: Get the most flags within a time frame
  • All 4 The Fish: Everyone must fight to get one flag
  • Boss: Team up to fight against the biggest penguin

However you want to play, if you think the cold never bothered you anyway, then get ready to get your fish on!
